articles.title: Miley Cyrus, Kid Lario, Doge: What to Expect from Elon Musks SNL Appearance - News18
articles.description: Ahead of this week’s late-night American comedy show Saturday Night Live (SNL), which will be hosted by SpaceX and Tesla CEO Elon Musk, the NBC show shared a picture of the entrepreneur with Miley Cyrus and the Kid Laroi on its official Twitter handle.

articles.title: Partnership with Microsoft will help preserve local languages, says FG - TheCable
articles.description: The federal government says it engaged Microsoft, an American multinational technology company, to help use machine learning and artificial intelligence in preserving local languages.
articles.content:
